title: So Riven just got buffed

embed.description: This is a WORK IN PROGRESS POST - Today' s Patch out but the PBE still down ] The PBE has been updated! Continue reading for more information! ( Warning: PBE Content is tentative and iterative - what you see may not reflect what eventually gets pushed to live servers!

body:
And by buffed i mean what little skill she had in her was completely taken away, those that are too lazy to click the link basically they made canceling autos when she Q's a lot easier, now a bronze V can do this with ease whereas before you actually needed a bit of a brain to use it.

Why is a champion that already has a broken kit and is easy to play being buffed? Whatever, ill perma ban her once i get back to Diamond after this reset is done.

replies.body: not to worried about riven changes tbh.. what concerns me are those ahri changes...

> [{quoted}](name=FruitSalad,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=fEEOZFkz,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-01-17T10:41:04.620+0000)
>
> not to worried about riven changes tbh.. what concerns me are those ahri changes...

What concerns me is that Ahri just got a skin. Meanwhile, Urgot, and plenty of other champions are crying in a corner, feeling neglected. It feels like yesterday that Popstar Ahri got released.

Riven isn't broken

EDIT: Reasoning

I don't think Riven is broken even with this change because of the fact that  she gets trashed/outscaled by every top lane champ that is currently META e.g. Liss, Maokai, Lulu, Rumble, Mundo and the fact that support champs like Janna, Lulu, Nami, Thresh are popular atm Janna makes it even harder for champs like Riven to have an impact in a game hence why you've seen a decrease in champs like Irelia because getting really fed and rushing the ADC every fight doesn't work anymore with champs like Janna/Lulu being popular.

She's just a soloq champ that will stomp in the hands of a good player when ahead in kills. However I like her more and think she is quiet balanced because you can still play around a fed riven compared to a fed akali/fizz/kat whom would just wreck the whole team no matter what.
Full build Riven is a decent duelist tbh, she excels at 100-0. she just struggles against armor stackers like Rammus/Maokai/Mundo/Malphite/Cho...
how about them tristana changes, SNAZZAY

I was worried because I didn't want Riven to be easier/stronger but I read a Riot response on the matter

Source:http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/R12g5sUE-broken-wings-q-now-auto-cancels-its-animation-allowing-riven-to-attack-much-faster-after-using-q?comment=000c
**Meddler:This is an unexpected change from some of the fixes in 5.1 to Overlapping CC effects (Riven's lockouts, which were blocking her from auto attacking automatically at once previously, use some of the same system that governs CC). We're going to look at this and discuss what the appropriate course of action is start of next week, will keep you folks posted.**


I'm glad that they will most likely revert it.

If it's on PBE, that means they are testing it, by no means is it certain that it's going to go through.

A lot of things on the PBE don't go through. if it perfectly cancels Q she will get some other form of nerf to compensate for it.
